xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/312305-Back to Ballin' 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/f2TNyiWTgQw4rNAEGRMPsvfV0Z.jpg Riding high on a steady string of hits, rapper Lil' Troy (playing himself) is quickly amassing a hip-hop empire. But someone seems eager to bring about the fall of Troy, and soon a traitor infiltrates the entourage. Meanwhile, Troy struggles with looking after his nephew, who's become deeply enamored with the bling-bling lifestyle. This gritty thriller helmed by director Tara E. Davis is based on the life of Houston performer Lil' Troy. Back to Ballin'
